## HW3 Alex

```{r cars}
data = read.delim("multiple.txt", sep = " ",header=FALSE)
```

```{r cars}
temp = colMeans(data)
```

```{r cars}
hnull = integer(50)
t.test(hnull,temp)
```
Problem #1.1
The P value is < .1, so we reject the null hypothesis and favor the alternative instead: true difference in means is not equal to 0

Problem #1.2

Type 1 Errors = 0.1

FWER = 1 - (1-a)^p = 1 - (0.9)^0.0008154 = 0.00008590727

FDP = 0.0008154
